name: Rogue Port - Blue Nightmare
description: Help reunite your missing friends and save your family from wild animals, mutants, inanimate objects, aliens and the undead!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 1 GB available space
